text: Vladimir Petrovich Zinchenko (; 10 August 1931 - 6 February 2014) was a Russian psychologist, academician, educator and writer. He got a Ph.D. in 1957. He was also an editor-in-chief of the journal of Cultural-Historical Psychology. He was born in Kharkiv, Soviet Union (now Ukraine). Zinchenko died on 6 February 2014 in Moscow, Russia. He was 82 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Vladimir Zinchenko biography Category:1931 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Disease-related deaths in Russia Category:Russian educators Category:Russian psychologists Category:Russian writers Category:People from Kharkiv
title: Vladimir Zinchenko
